title: Riot Games... Your Game is getting very frustrating
body: Riot ... I just came out of a Lower queue, which was not deserved.. Now my client crashed. I report bugsplat... Asked for assistance, and now I got another leaver buster... Are you serious? I am literally trying to resist not bad talking this client... But other people are having this same problem... So dear Riot ... Kindly take off leaver buster off : HyperlySarcastic   .. Thank you

replies.body:
It's really important to fix-up whatever is causing you to get these leaverbusters in the first place, and the lower priority queue is meant to give you that time or prevent what otherwise could have been another leave.  I do see we've replied to a few of your posts with solutions, but we can't force you to do the  legwork towards of troubleshooting.

The bugsplats are usually caused by hardware, bad game files, or driver issues, so you'll want to run through each step of the  [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out any possibility.  Should the issue still persist, contact us through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will work with you personally.  Good luck!
